snippet: President Obama's top advisers have been working to separate their candidate from an ad that lays the blame for the death of a cancer victim at Mitt Romney's feet.
abstract: President Obama's top advisers have been working to separate their candidate from an ad that lays the blame for the death of a cancer victim at Mitt Romney's feet.

headline.main: Obama Campaign Tries to Distance Itself From Widely Criticized 'Super PAC' Ad
headline.print_headline: Obama Camp Seeks Distance From an Ad
